location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map to accompany letter No. 824 dated 16th June 1903 to the Secretary to the Government of India in the Foreign Department.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paperDimensions: 610 x 410 mmFoliation: the map has been foliated with a number written in pencil enclosed in a circle in the top right corner of the recto side of the folio.

mods.abstract: The map shows part of the disputed frontier between Afghanistan and Persia in Sistan.Imprint: 'Intelligence Branch Topo. Dy. No. 4,834. Exd. C. J. A.'Distinctive features: signed by George P Tate, Survey Officer; shows trigonometrical points; Persian villages; Afghan villages; and 'Limit of Naizar'.
